sentence.text: Epilepsy with mental retardation limited to females (cell adhesion) is a syndrome characterized by early onset heat-sensitive epilepsy of infancy or early childhood and generally limited to females, which previously reported that the integrin-mediated signaling pathway gene superfamily subtype protocadherin 19 (cell adhesion) gene is its pathogenic gene.

Cognitive impairment or autism-like performance were often identified in these patients, hematuria metabolic diseases screening was normal, no abnormal MRI imaging of the head, and de novo cell adhesion gene mutations were found in their epilepsy gene protein polyubiquitination sequencing.
